snippet.title: S. Cargo Adventure Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Someone's stolen the postie's shell!

http://cargo.smidginsoftware.com/

Join Cargo in the adventure, exploring the world from a snail's point of view. Solve puzzles and collect items to work your way to the top of the tree, where the nefarious Bird awaits.

S. Cargo is now out of beta, and ready for download!

This game is free and open source software. Made with Blender, the GIMP, Inkscape and Audacity.
